answers.author: Matthew McQuillen
answers.text:
Dylan, our City Council holds work sessions on the Mondays where there isn't regular council meetings (we have regular meetings the 1st and 3rd Mondays of each month).  At these work sessions the Council discusses upcoming issues and has a more information conversation of what their feelings are related to the issue/topic and occasional have some brainstorming sessions related to topics they want to discuss, rather than all the topics/issues coming from the City Manager and staff.

title: Innovation meetings
